eventName: The Black Forest Wills A Dream
storyInfo: Upon request, Typhon delivers a special flower to Magallan and the others at Rhine Lab, causing the researchers to grasp the immense scientific value of the endless icefield. Elsewhere, Santalla learns that an Ursus Royal Guard has gone rogue. To resolve this crisis, everyone's paths will converge once more.

attributes.content: Spectacular! Show me another one!
attributes.name: Columbian Tourist

attributes.content: I daresay your skills would be no less impressive in Wrankwood, my friends.
attributes.name: Columbian Tourist

attributes.content: Huh. The guy waving the sign around looks a bit familiar... Was he the one who performed in front of a restaurant near Rhine HQ?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Oh right, being right next door to a fast food joint was the Caravan International Travel Agency's selling point.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But he was flipping that sign around way too fast for me to see what was on it.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hot springs.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Oh... Uh, have you been there before?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Nope, but I've seen more than enough outlanders shivering from the cold and asking where the hot springs are. That must be why they come here.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Heh, I'm actually pretty interested in those myself.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: When you're blessed by the Samivilinn, it's not so difficult to find a hot spring in the forest.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: While I haven't been to southern Sami in years, I've also heard that the locals often encounter anxious southerners on the road.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: They'll offer handfuls of unfashioned gold bars in exchange for divining the location of nearby hot springs.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: And do they get an answer?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hah. Who knows?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: What I do know is that some people mistakenly believe that—because of the southerners' apparent fondness for such ugly ingots—they must never have developed any sense of aesthetics.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Then I guess... they never reached a mutual understanding.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: However, they did end up finding experienced people like yourself, and eventually discovered the hot springs on their own.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Take a look at that. The thing that's always singing.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Oh, an advertising truck.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: That's right. If you follow it all the way, you'll find another hot spring that they're developing.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: This sort of thing happens often.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: You're quite knowledgeable about this little town.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Of course. It's Sami soil.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Even without many strange occurrences people need my help with, it's not like I can't figure out what's happening.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Hmm... This place feels pretty different from the rest of Sami, though.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Where did I put my visitor's brochure again... Oh, found it.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: According to the map, everything from here to here is nothing but resorts for the tourists. There are hardly any Sami homes.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: The neighborhoods we've been walking through not only have electricity, good signal strength, and even intercity net, but... (*takes a deep breath*) Yeah, I smell water purifiers, too.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Considering this is where a lot of major tech company offices are concentrated, it makes sense that they'd want convenient communications...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But the insides of the offices don't look much different from the ones at Rhine HQ.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Also, they're using steel beams and concrete to simulate the appearance of large trees, and putting their buildings on top of them. Isn't that offensive to the Sami?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Probably not?
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: I can see why they do, though; your people are terrified of Sami, so they lock themselves in metal cages for protection.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Can't argue with that... Even for researchers like me who've gone into the icefield quite a few times, there's no way we can match how freely you can move around out there.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Don't worry. Even so, you are still connected to the land of Sami.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: That's what Arges always said.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: ...Magallan, do you mind if I take a look at that brochure of yours?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Go ahead, but I got it when I was entering the endless icefield from Ursus, so all the labels are in Ursine. What did you want to see? Maybe I can help you find it!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Oh, that's the wrong side. That's just an ad for an Ursus nursing home with a Sami resort.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: It's fine, Magallan. I can read it myself.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Here they are... The coordinates from the transmission.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: ...Excuse me, I have some business to take care of. Typhon, Magallan, I'm afraid we'll have to say goodbye for now.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Ehehe. Next time, I'll be setting off for the endless icefield from here, so I'm sure we'll meet again, Simone!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: If we run into any snowstorms though, please come back to save us!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Haha, will do.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Next time, is it? ...That's right. After this little excursion is over, who knows where I might end up?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: I wish you the best, Magallan.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Bye, Simone!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: What about you, Li'l Typhoon?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Rhine Lab's office is right around the corner from here, and I need to make a report.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But... where's your client?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: No idea.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: All Arges said was that someone's waiting for me in Čappat.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Still...
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Well... I suppose I'll just walk around for now. I'm sure I'll run into them.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Hm? Then how about you check over here?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Oh right, lemme give you some spare change! That way you'll be able to take the tour buses to get around town!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Alright, I'm off!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Huh. And what the heck is 'Li'l Typhoon'?
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Typhon raises her head and sees a tall, familiar-looking figure standing beneath the eaves.
The hunter, in all her vigilance, failed to notice when she got there.
Okay then. I think I figured it out.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: ...The person waiting for me might have been none other than Arges herself.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Look who it is! If it isn't our little Maggy!
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: It's been forever since I heard your voice in the audio report archives, so we've been worried sick! We were just about ready to add your name to the search-and-rescue list!
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Ehehe... My luck's actually been pretty good so far!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: So, tired of energy bars and compressed biscuits yet? How about some flavorful Mama John's instant spicy beastmeat?
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Researcher

attributes.content: Oh, thanks!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Oh, but... Who might you be? Is that Beachbrella's logo on your clothes...?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: There's no need to look so confused. While our logo might feel out of place in cold and frigid Sami, corporate printed us a special snow-themed pattern. See?
attributes.name: Beachbrella Field Staff

attributes.content: Almost everyone knows your name by now, Magallan. The rising star of icefield research! So experienced at exploration, and at such a young age!
attributes.name: Beachbrella Field Staff

attributes.content: Eh...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hahaha! There's not much to do out here in Sami, so all us bored folks from the neighboring offices have gotten to know each other and share juicy gossip.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Besides, several large companies with lots of employees registered with the Exploration Society will be getting together to conduct the search-and-rescue operation of Director Maryam and his expedition team.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: You came back at just the right time. Now that we've prepared both the manpower and the resources, all that's left is the firsthand data you've brought back.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: For whatever reason, I've got a really good feeling about this mission. I can't even picture the Director getting himself killed. He's so stubborn he might as well be some kind of immortal monster himself.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: According to his files and medical reports, he's always just been a regular Kuranta.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But I also have faith he's still out there. Because... Uh, because I heard his voice when I was having auditory hallucinations along the way.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hallucinations?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Yeah... It's a long story.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: It'll probably take a while just to sort through the notes I took...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: For example, stay far away from black snow, and if you're hearing things, don't answer.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: And... near the endless icefield, on the Fjal Vetrtonn, there's a high wall made up of many fortresses filled with warriors.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I'm sure they're nice people, but it's best to keep your distance!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: A high wall? Can Sami technology compete with Victoria's city defense artillery?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: No, the people here aren't too different from how they're depicted in the explorer's guidebook published by Ursus last century.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: No progress in a hundred years?! We've gone from barren wastes to multiple high-tech cities in less than that!
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: No wonder my colleagues in the Business Section always complain about how difficult it was to set up an office here, and how hard it is communicating with the Sami.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: But if the locals can overcome the difficult environment with only their own methods, then it should be a piece of cake for us.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Mm, I wouldn't be so sure of that.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I've encountered plenty of situations where I was in over my head. I wouldn't have made it without my friend from Rhodes Island!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Oh, and there was also a particularly nice hunter I met near the icefield.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: She was incredible, you know. She knew all of Sami like her own backyard, and was always glad to help.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Both of them had so many survival skills I've never seen before, and they saved my hide more than once.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: ...Anyway, if you still have enough supplies left over for the search-and-rescue operation, I'd like to apply to join the team.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I got a ton of information during this trip through Sami, and might not be able to sift through all of it on such short notice–
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: —Hwuhhhh? Typhon?!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Good, you're still here.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Please do not doubt me, Typhon. I saw only a glimpse of fate.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: Only that you came to this little town, and gave away a casket.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: At the time I did not know where you got it from, what was inside it, or who was meant to receive it.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: Yeah, I'm used to that by now.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: So you went and found it yourself, right?
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: After sending you off, I also embarked on a journey to fulfill my destiny, and to await its guidance.
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: (*inhales*) ...You smell like snow dripping from the fir trees.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: You've come a long way. You crossed the icefield.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: You went... Mm. To places I've never been to before.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: (In Sarkaz) 'Surrender all to fate.'
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: (In Sarkaz) 'Surrender all to fate.'
attributes.name: Arges

attributes.content: It's great that you're the one to finally fulfill the prophecy.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Oh right, so where did you happen to get this little box?
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: This is the nice person I was just talking about!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Nice... person?
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Oh, hello there!
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: I've heard you're quite familiar with Sami. And we happen to be putting together a search-and-rescue team to enter the icefield through Sami and locate missing Rhine Lab members.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Do you think you could be persuaded to be our guide? We'll pay you handsomely!
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: I decline.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: If you need a guide, you'd better find someone else. I'm a hunter, and I have more important work.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: —Here, take this, Magallan.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Arges wanted me to give it to you. It belongs to Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: To... us?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: —You're right, this is our logo.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: ID verification lock, employee number...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: This is an equipment box from the Scientific Investigation Section.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Judging from its size, it should be a general-purpose lockbox used for storing sensitive components.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: And the serial number...
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: ...Belongs to Director Maryam.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Wait, Typhon! Arges met with the research team?!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Do you know the one this box belongs to?
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: It's my teacher's, the leader of the missing research team!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hm. In other words, Arges worked together with the missing team.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Wait, if she was a firsthand witness, and even cooperated with Rhine Lab...
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Then why hasn't she come to see us in person?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Because that is the vision she saw.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Vision—?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: —Is she one of the legendary Cyclopes? Are there really living Cyclopes in Sami?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: I have to meet her!
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Does she speak any modern languages? Do we need some kind of ritual to summon her?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: I... don't think she's all that different from us. She's pretty fond of Columbian geographical magazines.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But I'd like to speak with her face-to-face, too... Is there no way?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: She might just feel that this isn't the fated time yet.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Okay, but...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: What happened to the others, then?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Mm, I'm sure you can already guess the answer.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: All Arges told me was that she entered the icefield with the expedition team.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: ...So, the extra supplies Professor Mary took from the Scientific Investigation station weren't just for emergency use, but for her.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Cyclopes can see the future, and she tried her best to help the team avoid danger.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: But a tragic end was inevitable... Well, that's her way of saying she did the best she could.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: After encountering the demons, only she and the box's owner survived.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: The professor would always tell us that when facing nature, our first priority was to survive.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: We've never had such a huge loss of life since the formation of Scientific Investigation... And he must be even more devastated than us.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: ...So this is the endless icefield.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Typhon, did the survivor return with Arges?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (Shakes head)
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: He continued to advance deeper in, alone.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: I knew it...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: That... sure sounds like Director Maryam.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Also, I have some words to pass on.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: First, Arges wanted me to apologize to you.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Second, the person who gave her the box said... 'The journey of discovery must never end.'
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Hmm, I wonder what's inside the box.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Just a flower?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: We're currently cross-analyzing the chemical structure of the environmental particles stuck to the specimen box.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: However, we know very little about the endless icefield, and it may be difficult to determine the missing team's location based on this alone.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: If no matching data can be found... does that mean that the Director pushed the boundaries of human exploration into the icefield?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I believe so. Which is why this flower is an extremely valuable specimen.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Mhm. In all my time exploring the icefield, I've never seen anything like this.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Though, I have seen an entire field of flowers underground. The environment down there was pretty unique to be able to support plant growth!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But this particular flower...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Magallan carefully observes it through the display window of the specimen box.
...It looks really strange, almost like it isn't a plant at all.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: The flowers I dug up before had robust root systems to allow them to absorb nutrients from beneath the ice.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But... where are the roots on this?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Someone as careful as the Director wouldn't have damaged the specimen during collection. That would significantly reduce its research value.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Let's start with basic observations. Given the conditions here, we probably won't get any results right away.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: To conduct the next phase of research, we'll have to wait until the sample is transported back to HQ and passed on to Ecological for handling.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: A special Messenger will arrive in Čappat shortly.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: We can leave the in-depth study of the specimen to them. We still need to contact Director Maryam as soon as possible.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: By the way, Magallan, are you sure you want to head right back out on another trek? Your protective gear needs maintenance, and we won't be able to get any spare drones in Sami within three days.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Hmm... But I'm worried about the Director.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Besides, my protective gear is still in good shape. After all, I was only passing through Sami, not heading deep into the icefield.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Haha, there's really no stopping you.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Alright, then I'm going to break the specimen box's seal.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Understood. Please begin reporting your findings whenever. I'm ready to record!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: It was colorless flower, like a shadow cast by ice.
But the moment the box was unsealed, the invisible air throughout the laboratory was dyed with myriad colors.
It identified its current space, reoriented its position, and established its own territory.
The Columbian researchers had no time to react. They did not realize they were being contaminated along with the entire lab, nor did they hear the thunderous noise that shattered the dead silence.
—Wake up!
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: *gasp*!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* Wh-What happened?!
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Oh no, the wall... The glass is all shattered too. And, wh-wh-who are you? Who said you could barge in here?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Don't move.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: ...Phew! I've finished sealing the flower, Typhon! That should be good enough, right?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Yeah. Your react much faster than before.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Does this mean...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: 'When the box is opened, Andskotarnir will realize.'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: ...We've already opened the box.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Th-This is the Sami branch office, right? What's going on in here?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Task Force Messenger

attributes.content: Uh, something dangerous.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: ...Or, you could call it a major discovery.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: A completely new type of plant. Or even a completely new type of phenomenon!
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Hah. Director Maryam really sent us an amazing gift.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: But, something's off...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: If Director Maryam and Arges knew this flower was so dangerous, why did they send it back anyway?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Why didn't the Director try to stop us from studying it?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: What kind of question is that? Since when do explorers fear danger?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: A phenomenon that flies in the face of everything we take as common sense... This is an absolute scientific gold mine!
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Should we prioritize forming a larger team to study it in-depth?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Um, I think our search-and-rescue come first. We'll locate Director Maryam, and simultaneously open up a route for those who come afterwards.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Oh right, we also need to hurry up and ask the Director what he wants to name this new plant species.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I'll record a description to submit as a report. Please take my recording back along with the sample, Mr. Messenger.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Also, have HQ submit a report to the Exploration Society announcing this discovery as soon as possible!
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: ...Understood.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Task Force Messenger

attributes.content: I have to admit, the Exploration Society is much more efficient at getting teams together for this kind of thing.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Some of them don't even have the patience gather a team. You know who I mean, Magallan, like those explorers famous for preferring to work alone.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Yeah, some of them are my good friends. Even if you're always making fun of them.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But this discovery is much more valuable than any of my previous explorations.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I think this joint venture will attract not only explorers, but also researchers in the fields of biology, geology, and meteorology to join the expedition. More and more people will become interested in the icefield.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Haha, once we're back from the rescue operation, things might get so busy here we won't even recognize the place.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: How are you feeling, Magallan?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: I remember you mentioning before that you wanted to see if this so-called endless icefield really does have an end.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Well, now you're one step closer to your dream!
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Researcher

attributes.content: Well, that's hard to say...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Before Magallan can join her colleagues in celebration, she feels Typhon tugging on her hand.
...Huh?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (You want to talk to me... outside?)
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Well, Arges said there was no point trying to stop you, because you might find a way to discover everything about Sami on your own.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Just as Sami's warriors are willing to sacrifice their lives to hold the northern front, the southerners—yet to receive the revelation of their destiny—will continue exploring to lift the veil from this land at any cost.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: But before you people get too caught up in your fantasies, I have to remind you of something.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: This is also so you don't wind up as misfortunate as Arges said.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: Misfortunate?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: ...The Cyclopes's vision. The last thing she saw was a tragic ending.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: If you're ever in trouble, find me.
attributes.name: Typhon

attributes.content: ...Thank you.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Magallan suddenly feels a slight chill.
She turns her head, and inexplicably, a snowstorm is raging outside the window.
*cough* *cough*, *cough*... Hah...
attributes.name: Suspicious Liberi

attributes.content: You... understand the feeling of pain very well. More than most Sami, who've resigned themselves to it... *cough*, *cough*...
attributes.name: Suspicious Liberi

attributes.content: You understand how to torture someone. You Sami beasts... have no shortage of tricks.
attributes.name: Suspicious Liberi

attributes.content: Urgh... *cough*, *cough*... Hah... Engulfed in your witchcraft, I can't even feel the pain of being pierced by an ice pick.
attributes.name: Suspicious Liberi

attributes.content: I just want a clear answer.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: What is the Black Mark, and why have you smuggled in? Answer me.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: I can always end this sooner.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Hah... Hahaha. You'll regret this, witch. Letting me die here... will do nothing but make Sami suffer more!
attributes.name: Suspicious Liberi

attributes.content: Sami does not care about your foolish ambitions.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Ambitions? Hardly.
attributes.name: Suspicious Liberi

attributes.content: I've come here to die, and I'm more than happy to do so!
attributes.name: Suspicious Liberi

attributes.content: This information... will never be sent back to Ursus. And you'll regret it.
attributes.name: Suspicious Liberi

attributes.content: ...Speak.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: The Black Mark... is a missing member of the Emperor's Royal Guard.
attributes.name: Suspicious Liberi

attributes.content: I found his footprints. Black footprints.
attributes.name: Suspicious Liberi

attributes.content: His Dominion has collapsed. The demons have completely taken him... Hah, he will contaminate your land for all of eternity!
attributes.name: Suspicious Liberi

attributes.content: And nobody alive... knows where he is now.
attributes.name: Suspicious Liberi

attributes.content: You— Urgh—!
attributes.name: Suspicious Liberi

attributes.content: Let these words linger in your ears before the cold takes away your consciousness forevermore.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: The Sami know neither fear nor panic.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: We have guarded the mountains for hundreds of years. We are Sami's fangs, to sever the demons' tracks.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: You and your ilk... are not even 'enemies.'
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: ...The affairs of the Ursus end here.
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: Haha. O Fate, your warning has once again drawn my gaze back to the contaminated land of Sami...
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: How could I have ever forgotten my duty?
attributes.name: Santalla

attributes.content: I understand now, that is time for me to return to the wind and snow of the icefield.
attributes.name: Santalla
